title: Zachary Higgins

sections.title: Who I am
sections.content: My name is Zach. I'm a builder at heart—equal parts data scientist, systems thinker, and someone who can't stop turning ideas into real things. I like complexity when it has a purpose, and I get obsessed with details when they're the difference between something that merely works and something that feels right.

sections.title: What I believe
items: Technology should earn its place in the world—teaching, empowering, and leaving people better than it found them.
The human side of innovation is the real test: not what we can build, but what it does to the people living with it.

sections.title: Why this project
sections.content: Stories are how we understand the world. This tool makes it possible to craft immersive, scroll-based narratives that guide people through complex ideas. Built with care for both creator and audience.

cta: Ready to tell your story? Start by duplicating a story JSON and making it your own. Add media, adjust the theme, and publish. The world needs more ideas worth exploring.
